pr_title: Only allow constants for prepared statement parameters

timeline.bodyText: How about things like UDFs? Maybe we should disallow those as well?
timeline.author: kaikalur

timeline.bodyText: I thought we want to do all these kinds of things on RowExpression? Note that Core SQL is imminent and we will have yet another AST - for better or worse - so it will be best if we don't do more things using the current Expression API.
timeline.author: kaikalur

Also, I see another similar class:

timeline.author: kaikalur

timeline.message:
Only allow constants in prepared statement parameters

We were allowing anything without an explicit column reference, which
included SELECT * from table and SELECT 1 from table.  Now only
expressions that reference neither tables nor columns (nor *) will be
allowed.

Clean up parameters related code

Remove unused arguments being passed around, use ImmutableSet instead of
empty set, and have constructors delegate.
